project.component:
{:repl-history {:ide [], :local ["(time
 (let [gs (atom (grayscott 400 400 nil))]
 (dotimes [x (range 100)]
 (swap! gs upd 1))))" "(time
 (let [gs (atom (grayscott 400 400 nil))]
 (dotimes [x (range 1000)]
 (swap! gs upd 1))))" "(let [gs (atom (grayscott 400 400 nil))]
 (time
 (dotimes [x (range 10000)]
 (swap! gs upd 1))))" "(let [w 40
 h 40
 pixel-size 5
 gs (atom (grayscott w h false))

 cscale #(c/blend (css "white") (css "black") %)

 coords #(vector (int (/ % w)) (rem % w))

 step (apply comp (repeat 10 #(upd % 1)))]

 (svg "#app"
 {:width (* w pixel-size) :height (* h pixel-size)}
 (map-indexed (fn [i v]
 (svg/rect (map (partial * pixel-size) (coords i)) pixel-size pixel-size {:fill @(cscale v)}))
 (:u @gs)))

 (animate
 (fn [_]
 (swap! gs step)
 (let [u (:u @gs)]
 (doseq [[v x] (map vector u (dom/query-all nil "rect"))]
 (set! x "opacity" v))))))" "(let [w 40
 h 40
 pixel-size 5
 gs (atom (grayscott w h false))

 cscale #(c/blend (css "white") (css "black") %)

 coords #(vector (int (/ % w)) (rem % w))

 step (apply comp (repeat 10 #(upd % 1)))]

 (svg "#app"
 {:width (* w pixel-size) :height (* h pixel-size)}
 (map-indexed (fn [i v]
 (svg/rect (map (partial * pixel-size) (coords i)) pixel-size pixel-size {:fill @(cscale v)}))
 (:u @gs)))
 
 (println (dom/query-all nil "rect"))

 (animate
 (fn [_]
 (swap! gs step)
 (let [u (:u @gs)]
 (doseq [[v x] (map vector u (dom/query-all nil "rect"))]
 (set! x "opacity" v))))))" "(let [w 40

 pixel-size 5

 (swap! gs step)

 (set! x "opacity" v))))))" "(ns geom.grayscott.test
 (:require
 [thi.ng.geom.polygon :as polygon]

 [geom.utils.svg :refer [svg]]

 [geom.grayscott.core2 :refer [grayscott upd]]
 [thi.ng.color.core :as c]
 [thi.ng.domus.core :as dom]))" "(let [w 40
 h 40
 pixel-size 5
 gs (atom (grayscott w h false))

 cscale #(c/blend (css "white") (css "black") %)

 coords #(vector (int (/ % w)) (rem % w))

 step (apply comp (repeat 10 #(upd % 1)))]

 (svg "#app"
 {:width (* w pixel-size) :height (* h pixel-size)}
 (map-indexed (fn [i v]
 (svg/rect (map (partial * pixel-size) (coords i)) pixel-size pixel-size {:fill @(cscale v)}))
 (:u @gs)))

 (println (dom/query-all nil "rect"))

 #_(animate
 (fn [_]
 (swap! gs step)
 (let [u (:u @gs)]
 (doseq [[v x] (map vector u (dom/query-all nil "rect"))]
 (set! x "opacity" v))))))" "(let [w 40

 blues (c/grad-palette (c/css "light-skyblue") (c/css "#FAFAFA") 5)
 greens (c/grad-palette (c/css "olive") (c/css "#FAFAFA") 5)
 oranges (c/grad-palette (c/css "orange") (c/css "#FAFAFA") 5)

 find-color (fn [x]
 @(nth (condp = (-> x :seed :lr :flower)
 0 pinks
 1 blues
 2 greens
 3 oranges)
 (-> x :seed :lr :idx)))

 rf (fn [id origin]
 (flower {:id id
 :origin origin
 :lrs (shapes/flower-lrs
 [(randge 2 7)(randge 20 50)]
 [(randge 5 10)(randge 30 90)]
 [(randge 7 15)(randge 70 130)]
 [(randge 10 25)(randge 110 160)])
 :rotating? true}))

 f (fn [id origin]
 (flower {:id id
 :origin origin
 :lrs (shapes/flower-lrs [3 10] [5 30] [7 80] [12 120])
 :rotating? true}))

 fs (map f (range) [[100 100][300 300][300 100][100 300]])]
 (animate (fn [[a b]]
 (let [pols (apply shapes/flowers->voronoi [500 500] fs)]
 (svg "#app"
 {:width 400 :height 400 }
 (map #(svg/polygon (:polygon %) {:fill (find-color %)})
 pols)))
 true)))" "(+ 1 2)" "(let [gs (atom (grayscott 400 400 nil))]

 (let [t (clip 0 1 t)
 w1 (dec w)
 h1 (dec h)]

 (reduce (fn [gs [x y]]
 (let [idx (+ x (* y w))
 top (- idx w)
 bottom (+ idx w)
 left (dec idx)
 right (inc idx)
 f (get-f gs x y)
 k (get-k gs x y)
 cu (get u idx)
 cv (get v idx)
 d2 (* cu cv cv)]

 (-> gs
 (assoc-in [:u idx] (max 0 (+ cu
 (* t
 (+ (- (* du (- (+ (get u right) (get u left) (get u bottom) (get u top))
 (* 4 cu)))
 d2)
 (* f (- 1.0 cu)))))))
 (assoc-in [:v idx] (max 0 (+ cv
 (* t
 (- (+ (* dv (- (+ (get v right) (get v left) (get v bottom) (get v top))
 (* 4 cv)))
 d2)
 (* k cv)))))))))
 gs
 (for [x (range 1 w1)
 y (range 1 h1)]
 [x y]))))" "(time (do (upd2 (grayscott 200 200 nil) 1)

 w1 (dec w)
 h1 (dec h)
 [tu tv] (reduce (fn [[tu tv] [x y]]
 (let [idx (+ x (* y w))
 top (- idx w)
 bottom (+ idx w)
 left (dec idx)
 right (inc idx)
 ;f (get-f gs x y)
 ;k (get-k gs x y)
 cu (get u idx)
 cv (get v idx)
 d2 (* cu cv cv)]

 [(assoc! tu idx (max 0 (+ cu
 (* t
 (+ (- (* du (- (+ (get u right) (get u left) (get u bottom) (get u top))
 (* 4 cu)))
 d2)
 (* f (- 1.0 cu)))))))


 (assoc! tv idx (max 0 (+ cv
 (* t
 (- (+ (* dv (- (+ (get v right) (get v left) (get v bottom) (get v top))
 (* 4 cv)))
 d2)
 (* k cv))))))]))
 [(transient u) (transient v)]
 (for [x (range 1 w1)
 y (range 1 h1)]
 [x y]))]
 (assoc gs :u (persistent! tu)
 :v (persistent! tv))))" "(time (do (upd (grayscott 200 200 nil) 1)

 h 40

 gs (atom (grayscott w h false))

 (animate
 (fn [_]

 left (dec idx)
 right (inc idx)

 cv (get v idx)

 [(assoc! tu idx (max 0 (+ cu

 d2)

 idxH1 (* h1 w)
 idxH2 (* (dec h1) w)

 cui (get u idx)
 cvi (get v idx)
 d1 (* cu cv cv)
 d2 (* cui cvi cvi)]

 (* k cvi)))))))]))
 temp
 (range 0 w))]

 idxW1 (+ idx w1)
 idxW2 (+ idx w2)
 cu (get u idx)
 cv (get v idx)
 cui (get u idxW1)
 cvi (get v idxW1)
 d1 (* cu cv cv)
